title: Uber Driver - Essential Scenarios and Vocabulary
description: Platform-specific communication for Uber rideshare drivers

platformVocabulary.context: Higher rates during busy times - shown as multiplier (1.5x, 2x, etc.)
Customer knows exact price before booking
Percentage of trip requests you accept
Percentage of accepted trips you cancel
5-star rating system - need 4.6+ to remain active
Where customer set their location in app

phrases.english: Hi, I'm here for [name]. Are you at [landmark]?
phrases.spanish: Hola, estoy aquí para [nombre]. ¿Está en [punto de referencia]?
phrases.context: When you arrive at pin but don't see customer

phrases.spanish: Estoy en el [color] [tipo de vehículo] en [ubicación]

phrases.context: If pick-up area is no-stopping zone

tips: Text through app if customer hard to find
Use app's call feature (masks both phone numbers)
Wait at pin for full wait time (5 minutes)
Can't charge cancellation fee if you don't wait

phrases.context: Always verify name before letting them in
Secondary verification - they should know destination

verifyPassenger.safeTyRule: ALWAYS verify passenger name before starting trip. Wrong person = safety risk + payment issues

lateCustomer.waitTime: Must wait 5 minutes for UberX, 7 minutes for XL/Select before can cancel with fee

communication.english: I've been waiting 4 minutes. I'll need to cancel in 1 minute if you're not here.
communication.spanish: He estado esperando 4 minutos. Tendré que cancelar en 1 minuto si no está aquí.
communication.context: Warning message via app at 4-minute mark

lateCustomer.cancellationFee: Customer charged cancellation fee if you wait full time. You receive portion of fee

phrases.english: I'm following the app's navigation. Would you prefer a different route?
phrases.spanish: Estoy siguiendo la navegación de la aplicación. ¿Preferiría una ruta diferente?

phrases.english: The app is routing us this way to avoid traffic
phrases.spanish: La aplicación nos está dirigiendo por aquí para evitar tráfico

routeQuestions.protection: App navigation protects you in fare disputes. Always mention you're following app

phrases.english: You can add stops in the app. Each stop has a 3-minute wait time included.
phrases.spanish: Puede agregar paradas en la aplicación. Cada parada incluye 3 minutos de espera.
phrases.pronunciation: PWEH-deh ah-greh-GAR pah-RAH-dahs en lah ah-plee-kah-see-ON

phrases.english: We've been stopped for 3 minutes. The app charges a per-minute wait fee after that.
phrases.spanish: Hemos estado detenidos por 3 minutos. La aplicación cobra una tarifa por minuto de espera después de eso.

rules: 3 minutes free wait time per stop
After 3 minutes, per-minute waiting fee applies
Can end trip if excessive waiting (after communicating)
Stops must be added in app - not verbal agreements

phrases.english: There's heavy traffic ahead. The app is recalculating the best route.
phrases.spanish: Hay tráfico pesado adelante. La aplicación está recalculando la mejor ruta.

phrases.english: I need to slow down due to weather conditions for everyone's safety.
phrases.spanish: Necesito reducir la velocidad debido a las condiciones climáticas por la seguridad de todos.

phrases.english: Thank you for riding with Uber. Have a great day!
phrases.spanish: Gracias por viajar con Uber. ¡Que tenga un excelente día!

phrases.english: Please be careful exiting on that side
phrases.spanish: Por favor tenga cuidado al salir por ese lado
phrases.context: Safety reminder for traffic side exit

phrases.english: If you enjoyed the ride, I'd appreciate a 5-star rating
phrases.spanish: Si disfrutó el viaje, agradecería una calificación de 5 estrellas

ratingRequest.timing: Only mention if service was genuinely good. Let quality speak for itself otherwise

uberPro.explanation: Rewards program based on points earned from trips
uberPro.benefits: Priority airport queue, free roadside assistance, tuition coverage
uberPro.requirements: High rating (4.85+), low cancellation rate, high acceptance rate

uberReserve.explanation: Passengers can schedule rides in advance with higher reliability
uberReserve.driverBenefit: Higher pay, scheduled work, premium passengers

phrases.english: Thank you for choosing Uber Reserve. I'm committed to being on time for your scheduled pickup.
phrases.spanish: Gracias por elegir Uber Reserve. Me comprometo a llegar a tiempo para su recogida programada.

uberEats.crossover: Many drivers do both rides and food delivery
uberEats.note: Different communication style - minimal customer interaction for deliveries

dashcam.allowed: Yes, dashcam recording permitted in most states
dashcam.notification: Must inform passengers in some states - check local laws
dashcam.benefit: Protects you in disputes, false accusations, accidents

denialOfService.canRefuse: Yes, can refuse or end trip for valid safety reasons
denialOfService.communicate: Must be non-discriminatory reason (intoxication, threats, health concern, etc.)

tipExpectations.notRequired: Tips not required but greatly appreciated
tipExpectations.inApp: Passengers can tip immediately or hours later through app

cleanlinessStandards.required: Vehicle must be clean inside and out
cleanlinessStandards.consequence: Can be temporarily deactivated for dirty vehicle

surgeTiming.locations: Airports, downtown areas, entertainment districts, stadiums during events
surgeTiming.strategy: Position yourself in high-demand areas before peak times

boostZones.explanation: Uber offers multiplier bonuses in specific zones during specific times
boostZones.strategy: Check app for active boost zones, worth repositioning for 1.5x+ boost

questPromos.strategy: Plan work schedule to complete quests when available

tips Maximization: Offer phone chargers and bottled water
Know area well - can suggest routes
Help with luggage without being asked

appIssues.offline: If app goes offline, safely pull over, check internet connection, restart app
appIssues.gpsProblems: Can cause navigation issues and trip documentation problems. Restart phone if persistent

disputeProcess: Customer can report issues through app
Uber investigates using trip data, GPS, ratings history
You'll be notified and asked for your side
Fair disputes won't affect your standing

deactivation.reasons: Low rating (below 4.6), high cancellation rate, safety issues, violations
deactivation.prevention: Monitor your metrics weekly in app, improve areas of weakness
deactivation.appeal: Can appeal deactivation through Uber support with documentation

culturalNotes.note: Uber riders expect professional but friendly service. Not too chatty unless customer initiates
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Less social chatting than typical Colombian taxi culture

culturalNotes.note: 5-star system where anything below 4.6 average risks deactivation. Very high bar
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Much stricter than Colombian informal service evaluation

culturalNotes.note: Uber heavily monitors performance metrics. Must maintain high standards consistently
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More systematic performance tracking than Colombian taxi system
